description:
On her way home from school before summer break, Nanase Morina sees a Help Wanted sign. Past the thicket lies an Italian restaurant, Trattoria “Festa.” Can Morina do this job, knowing nothing about Italian food?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Iberico Buta no Sage Fuumi Poele
Iberico Ham, Roasted Poele-Style with Sage
イベリコ豚のセージ風味ポワレ
